page.title: 05ARMLEY FESTIVAL- W.LEEDS
page.content: The first Armley Festival was in 1977 and is now held every two years. The Festival is in two parts. In July the local schools have a gala in St.Bartholmew's Church (held there because it is one of the biggest buildings in Armley). Another event in July is the playing and marching of the massed bands. In September there is a carnival which takes place at Ley Lane Recreation Ground on Saturday and Sunday. It begins with a procession through the streets of Armley with bands, decorated floats and children in fancy dress. There are stalls and amusements for all the family. Sunday is Sports Day with races and games for the children. Armley Festival is a time for people to meet together, have fun and enjoy themselves.
